title: PharmacokineticsAssayTemplate
description: Generic template for describing data from a pharmacokinetics assay.

Component.description: Type of metadata template; provide the same one for all items/rows.

age.description: A numeric value representing age of the individual. Use with `ageUnit`.

ageUnit.description: A time unit that can be used with a given age value, e.g. years.
ageUnit.title: TimeUnit

aliquotID.description: A unique identifier (non-PII) that represents the aliquots used for e.g. replicate runs. This is linked to the specimenID.

assay.description: The technology used to generate the data in this file.
enum: Children's Dermatology Life Quality Index Questionnaire
ultra high-performance liquid chromatography/tandem mass spectrometry
assay.title: Assay

comments.description: Brief free-text comments that may also be important to understanding the resource.
comments.title: Comments

compoundDose.description: A dose quantity for the treatment compound. To be used with compoundDoseUnit.

compoundDoseUnit.description: A unit associated with the value(s) in compoundDose.

compoundName.description: Common name for a compound, e.g. “Selumetinib” (https://pubchem.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/compound/10127622)

dataSubtype.description: Further qualification of dataType, which may be used to indicate the state of processing of the data, aggregation of the data, or presence of metadata.
dataSubtype.title: DataSubtypeEnum

anyOf.description: Type of data represented by the entity (File, Dataset, etc.).
anyOf.title: Data

anyOf.description: Data that provides information about other data
anyOf.title: MetadataEnum

dataType.description: Links an entity to data types that the entity represents/contains. This is closely tied to the assay property. For example, a file of dataType `genomicVariants` might have an assay value of `whole genome sequencing`.

diagnosis.description: Diagnosis for the individual given signs and symptoms. Use the most specific diagnosis term that applies.
diagnosis.title: DiagnosisEnum

experimentalCondition.description: A free-text description of the experimental condition (e.g. 5 mM doxorubicin).

experimentalTimepoint.description: The numeric value indicating the time elapsed from the beginning of the experiment at which the specimen was collected. Use in tandem with timePointUnit

fileFormat.description: Defined format of the data file, typically corresponding to extension, but sometimes indicating more general group of files produced by the same tool or software
fileFormat.title: FileFormatEnum

individualID.description: A unique identifier (non-PII) that represents the individual from which the data came. This could be a patient or animal ID.

enum: HEK293 NF1 -/- with WT mNf1 cDNA
HEK293 NF1 -/- with R192X mNf1 cDNA
Schwann cell NF1 -/- with R681X mNf1 cDNA
HEK293 NF1 -/- with R1306X mNf1 cDNA
HEK293 NF1 -/- with R681X mNf1 cDNA
HEK293 NF1 -/- with WT tagged mNf1 cDNA
Schwann cell NF1 -/- with WT tagged mNf1 cDNA
HEK293 NF1 -/- Exon 17 #A15 G629R cryptic splice
ELK-TAD Luciferase Reporter HEK293 Stable NF1 -/-
HEK293 NF1 -/- with R1947X mNf1 cDNA
HEK293 NF1 -/- with R461X mNf1 cDNA
HEK293 NF1 -/- Exon 17 #B48 G629R cryptic splice
Schwann cell NF1 -/- with R816X mNf1 cDNA
HEK293 NF1 -/- with R816X mNf1 cDNA
HEK293 NF1 -/- with R2550X mNf1 cDNA
anyOf.title: CellLineModel

modelSystemName.description: A group of presumed common ancestry with clear-cut physiological but usually not morphological distinctions such as an animal model or cell line. EXAMPLE(S):  HEK293 (cell line), Minnesota5 (swine strain), DXL (poultry strain), RB51 (vaccine strain of Brucella abortus)

nf1Genotype.description: Genotype of NF1 gene in the biospecimen from which the data were derived, if known.

nf2Genotype.description: Genotype of NF2 gene in the biospecimen from which the data were derived, if known

organ.description: A unique macroscopic (gross) anatomic structure that performs specific functions. It is composed of various tissues. An organ is part of an anatomic system or a body region.
organ.title: OrganEnum

parentSpecimenID.description: A unique identifier (non-PII) that represents the parent specimen (sample) from which the data came from, e.g. the single parent tumor that was subsectioned into several samples.  The parentSpecimenID can be the same as specimenID when there is no subsectioning.

platform.description: A sequencing platform, microscope, spectroscope/plate reader, or other platform for collecting data.
enum: Affymetrix Human Genome U133 Plus 2.0 Array
IVIS Spectrum In Vivo Imaging System
NanoString Human nCounter PanCancer IO360 Panel
platform.title: PlatformEnum

resourceType.description: The type of resource being stored and annotated
resourceType.title: Resource

sex.description: Phenotypic expression of chromosomal makeup that defines a study subject as male, female, or other.

species.description: The name of a species (typically a taxonomic group) of organism.
species.title: SpeciesEnum

specimenID.description: A unique identifier (non-PII) that represents the subspecimen (subsample) from which the data came,  e.g. an ID that distinguishes between different parts of the same parent tumor specimen.

timepointUnit.description: For timed experiments this represents the unit of time measured
timepointUnit.title: TimeUnit

tumorType.description: The type of tumor that the biospecimen used to generate the data were collected from.
tumorType.title: Tumor

enum: Children's Dermatology Life Quality Index Questionnaire
ultra high-performance liquid chromatography/tandem mass spectrometry
AssayEnum.title: Assay

CellLineModel.title: CellLineModel

Data.description: Type of data represented by the entity (File, Dataset, etc.).
Data.title: Data

DataSubtypeEnum.description: Categorizes data based on its processing state. This is the main classification axis used for data types.  Not all data types can use this dimensions (e.g. clinical data).
DataSubtypeEnum.title: DataSubtypeEnum

MetadataEnum.description: Data that provides information about other data
MetadataEnum.title: MetadataEnum

enum: Affymetrix Human Genome U133 Plus 2.0 Array
IVIS Spectrum In Vivo Imaging System
NanoString Human nCounter PanCancer IO360 Panel
PlatformEnum.title: PlatformEnum

Resource.description: Resource classes. Most resource entities expected to be some type of "experimental data" and further specified via `dataType`.
Resource.title: Resource
